permafrost.tundra.collection

Class CollectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.collection.CollectionHelper

  • public final class CollectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with java.util.Collection objects.

    • Constructor Summary

        Type Parameters:
        E - The component type of the items stored in the collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to append the items to.
